module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *14.0.2.29* FREEPBX-20461 Add detail to Queues ring strategy tool tip. *14.0.2.28* FREEI-618 Dynamic Queue Agents causing ALL queue agents to disappear *14.0.2.27* FREEPBX-19819 Queue agent restriction is not working for 'No Follow-Me or Call Forward' option. *14.0.2.26* FREEI-492 Duplicate entry "Agent Availability Detail" qxact_reports *14.0.2.25* FREEPBX-19434 and FREEPBX-19433 *14.0.2.24* FREEPBX-19434 *14.0.2.23* FREEPBX-18609 Queue save/apply problem *14.0.2.22* vqplus position announcement fix *14.0.2.21* FREEPBX-17706 Wrong URL's in Used as Destination - Announcements *14.0.2.20* FREEPBX-17706 Wrong URL's in Used as Destination - Queues *14.0.2.19* prevent infinite loops in from-queue *14.0.2.18* FREEPBX-17552 Wrong URL's in Used as Destination *14.0.2.17* Fixing FREEPBX-17647 Adding confirmation popup to deleting queue *14.0.2.16* FREEPBX-17145 Queue 'Mark calls answered elsewhere' doesn't work good with 2 queues *14.0.2.15* FREEPBX-17175 Queues ring strategy not working if Call Screening enabled on extension *14.0.2.14* FREEPBX-15383 Page setting display line number shown lost after submit *14.0.2.13* FREEPBX-16371 Agent Retry not working after change *14.0.3.12* FREEPBX-15176 Remove outdated setting *14.0.2.11* FREEPBX-15347 look at all agents *14.0.2.10* FREEPBX-16064 Queue reports hold time to agents in the wrong language *14.0.2.9* FREEPBX-15460 Playback Queue Caller Count feature code not working *14.0.2.8* FREEPBX-15347 Unit tests *14.0.2.7* FREEPBX-15347 Queue feature code for logout/login toggle and Pause toggle not working *14.0.2.6* FREEPBX-15942 Queue Reset queue stats GUI glitch *14.0.2.5* FREEPBX-15350 always write out database hints *14.0.2.4* FREEPBX-15474 *14.0.2.3* FREEPBX-14945 FREEPBX-15058 FREEPBX-14938 *14.0.2.2* FREEPBX-14194 Queue volume override in GUI has no affect on sangoma phone *14.0.2.1* FREEPBX-14133 Ignore rvol when writing conf *14.0.2* FREEPBX-13364 Ability to set ringer volume *13.0.31* FREEPBX-12966 Errors in Queue pause dialplan *13.0.30* FREEPBX-12906 *13.0.29* Fix adding of call queues with modern databases (FreePBX-12845) by lidl *13.0.28* FREEPBX-12592,
